title: 81x11: Applicability of 18 U.S.C. § 207(c) to Employees with Supervisory Authority
summary: OGE advised a department that its former general counsel, a senior employee, had supervisory authority over separate agencies within that department and was therefore not eligible for any limitation of the scope of coverage of 18 U.S.C. § 207(c) afforded by 18 U.S.C. § 207(e).
